title: Biscuits in Bottom Center HUD pleaserino
body:
Hey guys, I just wanted to tell that {{item:2010}}  don't show up in the HUD above abilities and summoner spells, and this makes me a little sad (as someone who uses these biscuits on most AP mids and Supports) and I don't think it's fair that {{item:2003}}  and {{item:2041}} show up while {{item:2010}} don't. I don't think I'm the only one who would enjoy this change, so I am asking Riot to change this in the next patch and I will be very happy.

And I can't remember if {{item:2004}} show up either because I don't buy them a lot and I didn't see them in the patch 4.21 notes, but if they don't, please change this too.
Thanks!

replies.body: I've got the Biscuit in my sights
